name: Grace
long_description: I'm looking for a new family who will take care of me. I like playing with people and other dogs, I like walking in the park and eating healthy food. I'm very friendly and get along well with other animals.
preferred_owner_description: Family with kids and garden or living next to a park or forest. They need to have time to play with me and understand that I have a lot of energy.
